tohoku_2011.notes: Limited to IU/II stations. Hi-net would provide better coverage but requires account.

turkey_2023.notes: Using GEOFON (GE) network. KOERI (KO) would be better but may be restricted.

kaikoura_2016.notes: Limited to IU/II stations. GeoNet NZ would provide better coverage.

anchorage_2018.notes: Using IU/II stations. AK/AV networks would be better but may be restricted.

kumamoto_2016.notes: Using IU/II stations. Hi-net/F-net would be better but requires account.

hualien_2024.notes: Using IU/TW stations. CWB network would be better but may be restricted.

ridgecrest_2019.notes: Best coverage - dense CI network in region. Already have cached FC data.
